attributes.action: Promptly return the illegal small boat travelers back to France .
attributes.additional_details:
To reduce the strain being placed on the NHS . 

To reduce the strain being placed on the hard  pressed working classes and the hard pressed taxpayers .

To reduce the strain being placed on the social housing systems , here in the UK .

Start deporting the small boat travelers back to France on the same day that they arrive here in the UK
attributes.background: To start returning the illegal small boat travelers back to France & do it on the same day that they arrive in the UK

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700617
